snippet: Lawyers for Sulaiman Abu Ghaith, who is on trial on terrorism charges, sought permission from a judge to present the document, a full summary of his interrogation, to the jury.
abstract: Lawyers for Sulaiman Abu Ghaith, on trial in Manhattan on terrorism charges, seek permission from judge to present full summary of his interrogation to jury; calling statement 'linchpin of government's case,' defense attorneys argue that document should not be introduced to jury piecemeal throughout the trial.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Sulaiman Abu Ghaith, who is on trial on terrorism charges, sought permission from a judge to present the document, a full summary of his interrogation, to the jury.

headline.main: Interactions of Bin Laden and Son-in-Law Detailed in an F.B.I. Document
